title: Gentrix V1
description: This application was successfully migrated from a legacy Magic-based system to a modern web-based platform utilizing the latest programming languages and frameworks.

title: Gentrix V2
description: Gentrix version 2. The new platform offers a more user-friendly and contact based approach

title: Meals app
description: To test the app, Click Demo, scan the barcode and install it on your Android device.

title: ECommerce
description: During my bootcamp at Zuit, I completed an Ecommerce capstone project that served as a significant milestone in my journey to becoming a proficient web developer. This project was meticulously crafted using the latest programming languages and technologies, ensuring that it aligned with current industry standards. The goal of the project was to design and implement a fully functional Ecommerce platform that could handle real-world transactions and offer a seamless shopping experience for users.
